World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 27 日星期六 07:06:09 GMT 120
Strong quake in southern Guatemala jolts residents, felt in El SalvadorA magnitude 6.1 earthquake struck the southern Pacific coast of Guatemala late on Friday, according to the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), causing some to flee their homes and with early reports of damage to buildings. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 06:09:52 GMT IONTYX2NOJPNXJ6KOCFP743O64 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/earthquake-magnitude-61-strikes-guatemala-gfz-2024-01-27/Reuters世界美洲
Houthi's TV says U.S. and British airstrikes target Yemen portThe Houthi's Al-Masira television said on Saturday that the U.S. and the UK launched two airstrikes that targeted the port of Ras Issa, Yemen's main oil export terminal. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 04:55:16 GMT LJVK3NXEUBJ27GCQZN2ZWXWPGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthis-tv-says-us-british-airstrikes-target-yemen-port-2024-01-27/Reuters世界中东
Australia PM condemns neo-Nazis after arrest of 'disguised' groupAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese condemned on Saturday domestic neo-Nazi activity after a black-clad group was arrested on the country's national day, which saw rallies in support of its Indigenous people. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 03:36:09 GMT EQ6QUG5UAVM4LGDWZFXSFFE5II https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-condemns-neo-nazis-after-arrest-disguished-group-2024-01-27/Reuters世界亚太地区
Houthi missile damages oil tanker in Gulf of Aden, US hits Houthi targetA Houthi anti-ship missile damaged an oil tanker in the Gulf of Aden on Friday but no injuries were reported and a U.S. Navy ship was providing assistance, the U.S. military said. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 03:12:15 GMT XUZ637ILMJN6TBT5QLZDABSFOA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthi-missile-damages-oil-tanker-gulf-aden-us-hits-houthi-target-2024-01-27/Reuters世界中东
Biden, Qatar's emir agree hostage deal key to pause in Gaza fighting -White HouseU.S. President Joe Biden on Friday spoke with Qatar's Emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad al-Thani about Gaza and they agreed that efforts to secure the release of hostages taken by Hamas were key to securing a longer pause in fighting, the White House said. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 02:53:06 GMT TU4F6H3KBFIYDPZQPXV3QY3PH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-qatars-emir-agree-hostage-deal-key-pause-gaza-fighting-white-house-2024-01-27/Reuters世界
Australia PM vows to introduce bill to reshape tax cuts within weeksAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Saturday his centre-left government would soon legislate changes to planned tax cuts set to trim benefits to the wealthy while giving low-income earners more breaks, as many Australians battle higher living costs. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 02:18:29 GMT LV4XHGQW5ZMBLHSWP75KFI5FYM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-vows-introduce-bill-reshape-tax-cuts-within-weeks-2024-01-27/Reuters世界亚太地区
US advances fighter jet sale to Turkey, Greece; Congress likely to approveU.S. President Joe Biden's administration on Friday formally informed Congress of its intention to proceed with the $23 billion sale of F-16 fighter jets to Turkey, taking a major step toward completing a long-delayed process that tested ties with Ankara. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 01:54:36 GMT FU5NIKSLGBMM7A6EZJYLFJT53E https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/us-advances-fighter-jet-sale-turkey-greece-congress-likely-approve-2024-01-27/Humeyra Pamuk商业航空航天与国防
Mars rover data confirms ancient lake sediments on red planetNASA's rover Perseverance has gathered data confirming the existence of ancient lake sediments deposited by water that once filled a giant basin on Mars called Jerezo Crater, according to a study published on Friday. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 01:51:40 GMT BPXVX3636JM65ATCXMVOPTNWFI https://www.reuters.com/science/mars-rover-data-confirms-ancient-lake-sediments-mars-2024-01-27/Steve Gorman科学
Moldova separatist negotiator won't meet in government-held areas, citing arrest fearThe chief negotiator for Moldova's Russian-backed separatist Transdniestria region said on Friday that his team would no longer attend talks on the country's future in areas under government control because he feared arrest. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 00:31:16 GMT TDZ5XHDUQJKITDBX4SKYW6BS6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-separatist-negotiator-wont-meet-government-held-areas-citing-arrest-fear-2024-01-27/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Argentina pension, tax reforms scrapped from legislation to ease passageArgentina's new government withdrew major spending reforms from a sweeping "omnibus" bill in Congress to facilitate its approval, the economy minister said on Friday, while stressing President Javier Milei's pledge to eliminate the budget deficit. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:34:13 GMT 4XLF3OETIJJUJOKWGN7QNOFQSI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/pension-tax-provisions-scrapped-argentina-reform-push-ease-passage-2024-01-26/Eliana Raszewski世界美洲
North Korea, China agree to defend common interests as senior envoys meetNorth Korea and China agreed to strengthen tactical cooperation and defend common interests, the North's official KCNA news agency said on Saturday, reporting on Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui's meeting with Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Sun Weidong. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 21:50:43 GMT K7Q6FLOZCNIZLOQQIJM7NVFCPI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-china-agree-defend-common-interests-senior-envoys-meet-2024-01-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
